Package CollegeManagementAdvance

Class Student

java.lang.Object
CollegeManagementAdvance.Person
CollegeManagementAdvance.Student
All Implemented Interfaces:
Policies
Direct Known Subclasses:
FulltimeStudent, ParttimeStudent
public class Student extends Person implements Policies
The purpose of this class is to define the various properties of a student This class is a subclass of Person class I This class implements the interface Policies This class will be extended by FulltimeStudent and ParttimeStudent classes

1.8
